text: Begowal is a town and a Nagar Panchayat in Kapurthala district in the state of Punjab, India.Falling Rain Genomics, Inc - Begowal Located 31 kilometers north of Kapurthala City, the town has an average elevation of 225 metres (738 feet). Begowal is called NRI's area. The town's population includes of Labana, Jatt, Rajput, Brahmin, Khatri people. Before partition, Begowal belonged to Muslim (Khokhar Rajputs) jagirdar Chaudhary Fazal Mohammad Khan, and later his three sons, Chaudhary Abdul Aziz, Sardar Abdur Rashid Khan (a judge of the Kapurthala High Court), and General Aziz Ahmed (of INA fame). == References == ==External links== * DISTRICT CENSUS HANDBOOK KAPURTHALA 2011 - VILLAGE AND TOWN WISE PRIMARY CENSUS ABSTRACT (PCA) Category:Cities and towns in Kapurthala district
title: Begowal
